sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceDatabase] = '[Ammex]'
--	  AND [SourceObjectType] = ''
--	  AND [SourceObject] = '[EXT01100]'
	  AND [IsLoad] = 1
--	  AND [IsLoadTesting] = 0
ORDER BY [SourceObject] ASC

SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceDatabase] = '[Ammex]'
	  AND [IsLoadTesting] = 1
ORDER BY [SourceObject] ASC

SELECT *
FROM [ETL].[AdfLoadControl]
WHERE [SourceSystem] = 'Ammex_Staging'
	  AND IsLoad = 1
ORDER BY [SourceObject]

/**************************************************************************************
* Name		: AdfLoadControl_PopulateAmmex.SQL
* Author	: Duy Huynh
* Date		: 2022-05-19
* Details	: Collect the meatadata from source system for subject to build pipelines on to EDW.
			  The following script execute against the system
				Server: Denali
				Database: Ammex
* DataBase	: AmmexDataWarehouse
* Schema	: ETL
**************************************************************************************/

SELECT	DISTINCT
		[ServerName] = QUOTENAME(@@SERVERNAME), 
		[SourceSystem] = 'Ammex',
		[Table_Catalog] = QUOTENAME(T.TABLE_CATALOG),
		[Table_Schema] = QUOTENAME(T.TABLE_SCHEMA),
		[Table_Name] = QUOTENAME(T.TABLE_NAME),
		[Table_Type] = 'Table',
		[Column_Name] = QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME),
		[IsPrimaryKeyColumn] = CASE WHEN TC.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' AND CCU.COLUMN_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 1  ELSE 0 END,
		C.[IS_NULLABLE],
		C.[Data_Type],
		C.[Numeric_Precision],
		C.[Numeric_Precision_Radix],
		C.[Character_Maximum_Length],
		[FormatDatatype] = CASE 
                                WHEN UPPER(C.DATA_TYPE) IN ('date', 'datetime', 'smalldatetime')                                     
									THEN CONCAT(QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME), ' = CASE WHEN [SRC].', QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME), ' = ''NULL'' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(DATETIME2, [SRC].', QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME), ') END,')
								WHEN UPPER(C.DATA_TYPE) IN ('uniqueidentifier', 'bit', 'tinyint', 'int', 'bigint', 'float', 'money', 'real', 'smallint', 'binary')                                     
									THEN CONCAT(QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME), ' = CONVERT(', QUOTENAME(UPPER(C.DATA_TYPE)), ', [SRC].', QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME), '),')
                                WHEN UPPER(C.DATA_TYPE) IN ('numeric', 'decimal') 
                                    THEN CONCAT(QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME), ' = CONVERT(', QUOTENAME(UPPER(C.DATA_TYPE)), '(', C.NUMERIC_PRECISION, ', ', C.NUMERIC_PRECISION_RADIX, ')', ', [SRC].', QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME), '),')										 
                                WHEN UPPER(C.DATA_TYPE) IN ('char', 'nvarchar', 'varchar', 'varbinary') 
                                    THEN CONCAT(QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME), ' = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(', C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH, '), [SRC].', QUOTENAME(C.COLUMN_NAME), '),')
                                ELSE quotename(C.COLUMN_NAME) + ','
                            END,
		[UpdateStatement] = CASE WHEN C.COLUMN_NAME = 'LastUpdateDate' THEN '['+ C.COLUMN_NAME + '] = GETDATE()' ELSE '['+ C.COLUMN_NAME + '] = SRC.[' + C.COLUMN_NAME + '],' END,
		[View_Definition] = NULL,
		[LoadDate] = GETDATE(),
		[IsSourceDeleted] = CONVERT([BIT], 0),
		[IsSourceDeletedDate] = CONVERT([DATETIME2], NULL),
		[LastUpdatedDate] = CONVERT([DATETIME2], NULL)
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES T
	 JOIN INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS C
		  ON T.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME
	 LEFT JOIN INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS TC
		  ON T.TABLE_NAME = TC.TABLE_NAME
			 AND TC.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY'
	 LEFT JOIN INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CONSTRAINT_COLUMN_USAGE CCU
		  ON CCU.CONSTRAINT_NAME = TC.CONSTRAINT_NAME  
			 AND CCU.TABLE_NAME = T.TABLE_NAME
			 AND CCU.COLUMN_NAME = C.COLUMN_NAME
WHERE T.TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'
UNION
SELECT	DISTINCT
		[ServerName] = QUOTENAME(@@SERVERNAME), 
		[SourceSystem] = 'Ammex',
		[Table_Catalog] = QUOTENAME(V.[TABLE_CATALOG]),
		[Table_Schema] = QUOTENAME(V.[TABLE_SCHEMA]),
		[Table_Name] = QUOTENAME(V.[TABLE_NAME]),
		[IS_NULLABLE] = 'NO',
		[Table_Type] = 'View',
		[Column_Name] = NULL,
		[IsPrimaryKeyColumn] = NULL,
		[Data_Type] = NULL,
		[Numeric_Precision] = NULL,
		[Numeric_Precision_Radix] = NULL,
		[Character_Maximum_Length] = NULL,
		[FormatDatatype] = NULL,
		[UpdateStatement] = NULL,
		[View_Definition] = V.[VIEW_DEFINITION],
		[LoadDate] = GETDATE(),
		[IsSourceDeleted] = CONVERT([BIT], 0),
		[IsSourceDeletedDate] = CONVERT([DATETIME2], NULL),
		[LastUpdatedDate] = CONVERT([DATETIME2], NULL)
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS V

preCopyScript.value: IF OBJECT_ID('[Loader].[AdfLoadControlSourceSystemInformationSchema]') IS NOT NULL    DROP TABLE [Loader].[AdfLoadControlSourceSystemInformationSchema];
